abstract: Randy Falco, the chief executive of AOL, told a group of advertising executives that Microsoft is making a mistake in going after Yahoo. Unlike Google, which is trying to block the deal, he’s not going to get in the way.
snippet: Randy Falco, the chief executive of AOL, told a group of advertising executives that Microsoft is making a mistake in going after Yahoo. Unlike Google, which is trying to block the deal, he’s not going to get in the way.
lead_paragraph: Nobody could get off the stage at the Interactive Advertising Bureau convention here in Phoenix without being asked about the prospect of Microsoft’s acquisition of Yahoo.

headline.main: Randy Falco’s Napoleonic Strategy at AOL
